tool.name: CreateDataAggregationGrid

param.name: Input_extent_feature_class
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename to the feature class of the study area.

param.name: Output_grid_feature_class
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the output grid file.

param.name: Cell_size
param.dialogReference:
Specify in the size of the grid squares in map projection units. If the desired cell size is a proportion of the study area's total rectangular extent (e.g. 10% of the extent), set this parameter to 0 and modify the Proportion of total rectangular extent area for each cell parameter below.

Default is 1000.

param.name: Proportion_cell_area
param.displayname: Proportion of total rectangular extent area for each cell (value between 0 and 1; only used if cell size is 0)
param.dialogReference: Specify the desired cell size as a proportion (between 0 to 1) of the total rectangular extent. For example, if the desired cell size is 10% of the extent, then this parameter should be 0.1

param.name: Grid_coverage
param.expression: Rectangular, covering full extent of boundary feature class | Grid covers area bounded by boundary feature class only
param.dialogReference:
Specify the extent of the output grid:

  • Rectangular, covering full extent of boundary feature class: The output grid will be rectangular in shape and cover the full height and width of the boundary.

  • Grid covers area bounded by boundary feature class only: The output grid will follow the boundary of the feature class.

param.name: Grid_boundary_cells_percent
param.displayname: Percentage of underlying land cover area for grid cells on boundary
param.dialogReference:
Specify the percentage of the area within each grid cell that the study area must cover.

i.e. a value of 100 means that each grid cell will be completely covering land. A value of 25 would mean that any grid cell which has 25% or more land will be included in the grid.

param.name: Buffer_radius__projection_units
param.dialogReference: Specify the size of the optional buffer in map projection units.

param.name: Align_to_grid
param.dialogReference: If True, sets the grid to integer extent values, and aligns to appropriate coordinates, rounding min xy values down, and max xy up, depending on the distance between the shortest polygon extent side.

param.name: Significant_figures
param.dialogReference:
Number of significant figures to align the coordinates to. This refers to the difference between the shortest length, so for coordinates of 123411 and 123511, where the difference is 100, and a sig_figs value of 2, the output would be 123410 and 123510.

Default is 3 significant figures.

tool.summary: This tool creates a grid of squares over the input study area with a user-defined size and coverage.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates a grid of squares over the input study area with a user-defined size and coverage.
